titleStmt.title: The divine life in three treatises ... by Richard Baxter.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Tyton ... and Nevil Simmons ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
(from t.p.) Of the knowledge of God -- Of walking with God -- Of co[n]versing with God in solitude.
